meanings.definition: The process of converting information into a digital format.
meanings.sent1: The digitalizations of old photographs made them easier to share online.
meanings.sent2: Our company's digitalizations of paper documents saved a lot of storage space.
meanings.sent3: The digitalizations of recipes made cooking more convenient.
meanings.sent4: Her digitalizations of handwritten notes turned chaos into order.
meanings.sent5: The digitalizations of textbooks allowed students to carry all their books in one device.

meanings.definition: The act of using digital technology to improve efficiency or accessibility.
meanings.sent1: The digitalizations in the library made finding books much quicker.
meanings.sent2: The digitalizations in the hospital reduced waiting times for patients.
meanings.sent3: The digitalizations in the office made everyone's workday smoother.
meanings.sent4: Her digitalizations of the schedule simplified everyone's lives.
meanings.sent5: The digitalizations of the transportation system improved commuting for many people.

meanings.definition: The transformation of analog data into digital form.
meanings.sent1: The digitalizations of old vinyl records preserved the music for future generations.
meanings.sent2: The digitalizations of VHS tapes allowed us to watch old home videos on our computers.
meanings.sent3: The digitalizations of cassette tapes brought back memories of the '80s.
meanings.sent4: Her digitalizations of family photos kept them safe from damage.
meanings.sent5: The digitalizations of important documents ensured they would never be lost.
